name: Intergalactic National Championship (Mago)
description:
In the distant future... Universities have expanded to such degree that territory has become scarce. A great battle for ownership of land soon followed...

After many hard battles fought and lives lost, two universities remained. Now it's up to you and your greatest rival to decide the fate of the world...

Specifications / Controls:

-Xbox controllers required

-Two players (no online functionality)

-Use left analog stick for movement and right analog stick for aiming

-Use right bumper (RB) to shoot

Credits:

Designer:

-Edwin Sanchez

Programmers:

-Manuel Govea

-Dalton Hyde

-Jesse McNamee

Artists:

-Wesley Gordon

Music:
